data.text:
The hotel is located in the newer part of the city, in the shopping district and easily accessible to the metro and taxis on the street.

There is a bevy of staff in the small reception area trying to be helpful with the door and luggage. Check in was efficiently handled.  

The room is well furnished though a bit compact. I had a view of the side street from my window. The highlight was the thoughtful placement of lights, alcoves and charging points. Well designed I must say. 

Bathroom had a tepid shower - should be improved. And for the extreme compact size of the bathroom, the separating outward opening doors for the western closet and shower and basin areas were a bit problematic. 

Breakfast was nice, good spread and choices. Not included in the room price (astronomical during MWc) and they can be more transparent about this as well. But the breakfast is recommended.
data.title: Compact room, good location, great breakfast

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for this review.

We're delighted to hear that you appreciated our hotel's prime location in the vibrant shopping district and found our check-in process efficient. Your kind remarks about the thoughtful placement of lights, alcoves, and charging points in our well-furnished rooms are truly appreciated. Our team takes pride in designing spaces that cater to the comfort and convenience of our guests.
We regret to hear that the shower temperature did not meet your expectations, and we would like to assure you that our maintenance team is dedicated to ensuring all facilities operate at optimal levels. Thank you for your recommendations regarding the bathroom doors; we continually strive to improve our guest experiences. It's a pleasure to learn that you enjoyed our extensive breakfast selection, and we acknowledge your feedback regarding its transparency in relation to the room price.
We're overjoyed that you would recommend our breakfast, as we pride ourselves on offering a variety of quality options to start the day right.

We would be thrilled to count you among us once again.
Kind regards,

Josep Corominas, Rooms Division Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: We had a two night stay in February 2024, the hotel was easy to find and well located on the main shopping street (directly opposite Gucci). Staff were friendly and helpful. Room was clean and comfortable, well light and a good temperature. Pleasant surprise that the smellies in the room were Rituals ðŸ˜Š well stocked toiletries including a razor, toothbrush etc. great rooftop bar that serves food and drink all day - slightly pricer than other bars but great views of the Sagrada Familia and one of Gaudis houses. The only let down was the refreshment tray; cheap and tasteless tea and coffee sachets and no biscuits!
data.title: Great location and lovely rooms

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Lizzie,
We would like to thank you for this review about your experience in our hotel.

We are thrilled to hear that you found our location ideal, right in the heart of Barcelona's shopping district and that our team's friendliness and helpfulness added to the comfort of your stay. 

It's wonderful to know that the cleanliness and comfort of our rooms met your expectations and that the Rituals toiletries were a delightful touch. 

We're also glad you enjoyed our rooftop bar's stunning views and atmosphere, despite noting that the prices were a bit higher than elsewhere.

We regret that the refreshment tray did not meet your standards, and although we strive to provide quality amenities, it seems we fell short in this area. We appreciate your feedback as it helps us continuously improve our guest experience.

We hope to welcome you back. 
Best wishes,

Josep Corominas, Rooms Division Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: The Condes de Barcelona is in a perfect spot to visit the major sites that Barcelona has to offer. The front desk workers were friendly, kind, knowledgeable about the area and very helpful in securing tickets to some of the sites. Everyone spoke English fluently as did the majority of the people in all the stores. The rooms were cleaned daily and the refrigerator was stocked, as well. The rooftop bar offered fantastic views of the city while you relaxed with a drink or some tapas. We will definitely return to this hotel.
data.title: Beautiful Hotel in a Beautiful City

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
We would like to thank you for this positive review of your experience in our hotel.

We're delighted to hear that our central location served as the perfect base for your exploration of Barcelona's major sites. 

Thank you for the mention about the friendliness of the front desk team, agreat team that works very hard to deliver service in a genuine attitude. 

Your appreciation of the daily room cleaning and stocked refrigerator is much acknowledged. 

Moreover, we're thrilled that the rooftop bar's panoramic city views enhanced your relaxation and enjoyment of drinks and tapas.

We look forward to seeing you again soon, 
Kind regards,

Josep Corominas, Rooms Division Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text:
We had a great experience at this Hotel. I was here for 4 nights on our honeymoon. We wanted something in center of Barcelona that was upscale but without unnecessary luxuries like at a full-on resort. We'd leave our room about 9AM and return about 1030PM. There are excellent restaurants close to the hotel. We tried Taktika Berri and Restaurante Gresca, both were excellent experiences as well. 

The rooftop bar has a very nice view. We didn't use much of the amenities but the hotel room was nicely sized, modern, and the view of the quiet courtyard was nice. The hotel staff was very kind and helpful as well. Upscale and excellent value, I would stay again.
data.title: Excellent stay in the Eixample district

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for positively reviewing your visit.

We're thrilled to hear that our central location in the Eixample district contributed to an excellent stay during your honeymoon. It's wonderful to know that our rooftop bar's view added a special touch to your visit, and we're glad that the size and modernity of your room met your expectations. Our team is heartened by your kind words about their helpfulness and we're proud to have offered you upscale value.

We look forward to seeing you again soon, 
Kind regards,

Josep Corominas, Rooms division manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text:
The lobby and surrounding area is beautiful, and the staff were very helpful.  However, the rooms are badly in need if an upgrade,  Weâ€™ve stayed at this hotel in the past, when it was affiliated with the now, Monument Hotel, and the rooms were much better at that point.

Theyâ€™ve aged a lot, and they are insanely dark.  Barely lit hallways await you, as you find your way to your room.  The carpeting is old, and perhaps why they keep the lights dimmed.  The bathrooms are also in need of an upgrade, and the showers have no shelves at all, so your bath products must go on the floor.  The family room was large, and had steps leading down into the sleeping quarters.  The balcony doors donâ€™t open, but look as if you can get some fresh air.  

Itâ€™s a shame, since we used to love this hotel.  Itâ€™s located in a fantastic, and very walkable part of the city.
data.title: Nice lobby, but itâ€™s a facade for the rest of the hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Danielle,
Thank you for taking the time to share your review.

We're pleased to hear that our lobby met your expectations and that you found our staff to be helpful. Itâ€™s rewarding to know that the service provided by our team has been recognized. 

Regarding your comments on the room conditions, we're sorry to hear that they did not meet the high standards we strive to uphold. Please rest assured that we are committed to maintaining a quality environment for our guests. While the historical charm of our property does come with certain unique characteristics, we continuously work on improvements and updates to enhance our guest experience. 

We appreciate your remarks on the lighting and bathroom amenities and will certainly consider them as we plan for future refurbishments.

We hope to welcome you back.
All the best for the festive season!

Josep Corominas, Rooms division manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager
